abstracts.cdata!:
The Expressway Project for Venezuela
            will assist in financing a part of its four-year Highway
            Development project. The project consists of the completion
            of construction of about 94 km of multilane, toll
            expressways or "autopistas". Two separate sections
            of autopista are involved, one of 59 km in length from
            Tejerias to Coche, in continuation of the existing
            expressway from Valencia, and the other of 35 km in length
            from Valencia to Puerto Cabello. The project will yield a
            reasonable economic return on capital investment, resulting
            principally from the savings in vehicle operating costs by
            using the new highway facilities as an alternative to the
            existing inadequate and congested roads.
